With his previous loan, he strengthened his business and generated more revenue to live on and make his payments on time. He really appreciates the support it has brought him.

loans.use: to invest in footwear and supplies for his store, like beverages, sweets, eggs, salt, sugar and other products to attend to his clients from day to day.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El tiene  41 años de edad es soltero y trabaja como minero donde percibe el salario mínimo. Padece de cataratas en su ojo izquierdo por antecedentes familiares. El sufrió mucho al ver como su mamá quedo ciega a consecuencia de las cataratas y no quiere sufrir por lo mismo. El no tiene ninguna prestación por parte de la empresa donde trabaja por lo que tiene que costearse por el mismo el tratamiento quirúrgico que necesita.
texts.en: This borrower is 41 years old.  He is single and works as a miner where he earns the minimum wage.  He suffers from cataracts in his left eye; this is a genetic condition that runs in his family.  He has suffered a lot seeing his mother become blind as a result of the cataracts, and he does not want to suffer the same fate.  The company where he works does not provide this kind of health service, and so he must pay out of pocket for the surgical treatment that he needs.

loans.use: to pay for ophthalmic treatment

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El tiene 28 años de edad es casado, trabaja como electricista. Hace 7 meses fue operado para corregir la miopía que presentaba, sin embargo tuvo una infección que no se trato adecuadamente y la operación se complico, tiene que volver a operarse de urgencia por que este desgarro puede perforar la retina y llegar a perder la vista. también podría perder su trabajo. El es el único sustento de su familia.
texts.en: This borrower is 28 years old and is married.  He works as an electrician.  Seven months ago, he had an operation to correct myopia.  However, he got an infection that was not treated appropriately, and so he had complications from the operation.  He has to return for urgent surgery, as there is a risk that his retina could get perforated and he could lose his vision, as well as his job.  He is the only source of support for his family.

loans.use: for ophthalmic treatment

loans.name: Yorn Group

texts.en:
Yorn is a 46-year-old married rice farmer with four children, and she resides in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. Three of her children attend school and another one is a motor mechanic. Yorn is pictured 1st from the right and has cultivated rice since 1989. Her husband is a 51-year-old rice farmer as well. Together, they can earn approximately $6 per day.

Yorn, a group leader, would like to request a loan as part of a group of four members, and Yorn will use her portion to purchase fertilizer for farming. With this loan, she will be able to helps her to increase her family income.

In the future, Yorn wants to buy more cows to fatten to earn additional income, build a new bigger house and support her children to earn higher education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for farming

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is a 32-year-old woman from the town of Carles in Iloilo, Philippines. She is married and has 4 young children, aged 7, 4, 2 and 1 year old.

Lorena earns a living, together with his husband, through their fishing business. They have been practicing this business for 7 months.

Lorena is requesting a loan to buy fishing nets to enhance their catch and to buy gasoline used for their fishing boat.

Lorena and her husband work together to provide for their children's needs. In the future, they dream of being productive and earning a better living.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and gasoline.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a 57-year-old single woman residing in the town of Bilar, Bohol. She has been a merchant for almost eight years now.  She engages in food vending. She sells snack foods like suman (made from cassava cooked in coconut milk, and often steamed wrapped in buli or banana leaves). 

She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients like sugar and flour and to purchase materials for comfort room renovation. These could enable her to improve her daily earnings. She could also be able to purchase materials needed for her comfort room renovation. Slowly, Rosalina would be able to settle her finances and set aside some savings for emergency use.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like sugar and flour and to purchase materials for comfort room renovation

loans.name: Anamie

texts.en:
Anamie is 43 years old and married with two children.  With both children in school, Anamie works very hard to provide for them.

Anamie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Anamie has been in this business for nine years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, nooldes, diapers and other groceries. 

In the future Anamie would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Joveliza

texts.en:
Gera Adria is 19 years old. Her mother Joveliza a member of NWTF and supports the family through her livestock business in the Philippines.

Gera Adria is studying Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education and is currently on her final year of this 4-year course.

Joveliza is borrowing PHP 10000 to pay tuition fee of her daughter Gera Adria for the first semester of the school year 2015-2016.

When she graduates, Gera Adria plans to be gainfully employed so she can help to improve the quality of life of her family in the future.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Gina works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling rice and mineral water in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Gina is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice, and containers of mineral water to sell for her business.

Gina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice, and containers of mineral water to sell.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 35 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia ofimática.
El es inteligente, emprendedor y muy constante. Sus estudios los realiza en un instituto privado ubicado en la zona ‘Pampahasi’ caracterizado por encontrarse sobre una ladera de la ciudad, donde las calles son empinadas.
Juan es moreno de baja estatura y físico delgado. Su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español, su vida la comparte con su madre que no trabaja porque es mayor de edad, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Él trabaja como sargento de policía, sus deseos de superación lo llevaron a estudiar ofimática para desempeñar mejor sus funciones dentro de la oficina de policía, “mi poca preparación en computación es una desventaja dentro de mi cargo profesional…” comenta. La ventaja de sus actividades es que ambas se complementan, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de una computadora portátil. Su sueño es continuar estudiando para lograr obtener un cargo jerárgico dentro de la policía, le desea comprar una computadora portátil para continuar estudiando ofimática. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos dentro de la institución en 13 años que viene desarrollando su actividad en la policía.
Es por esos motivos que Juan solicita un préstamo para la compra de una computadora portátil para continuar estudiando ofimática.
texts.en:
Juan is a 35-year old man. He is single and has no children. He is studying office IT.

Juan is intelligent, enterprising and quite tenacious. He goes to school at a private institute located in the ‘Pampahasi’ zone, which is on a hillside above the city and known for it steep roads.

Juan has a dark complexion. He is short and thin. His native tongue is Aymará, but he also speaks Spanish. He shares his life with his mother, who does not work at her advanced age. They live in their own home, which is made of brick and has all the basic services. Juan works as a police Sargent. His desire to improve his situation lead him to study office IT. With that education, he will be able to better carry out his duties at the police station. Juan says, "the little training I've had information technology is a disadvantage in my professional duties." It's an advantage that his two chosen activities complement each other. A difficulty Juan has is a lack of capital to purchase a laptop computer. Juan's dream is to continue his studies so he can get a promotion at the police station.

Juan wants to purchase a laptop computer so he can keeping studying office IT. This is his first lending cycle with the institution in the thirteen years he has been working with the police.

Juan wants a loan so he can purchase a laptop computer and continue studying office IT.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop computer so he can continue studying office IT.

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es: Rosa es una mujer de 49 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras de forma domiciliar, por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes que solicitan sus productos, por lo que se siente feliz de contar con este negocio. Rosa vive en casa de su propiedad junto a sus dos hijas de 18 y 9 años de edad a las que ha logrado sacar adelante como madre soltera. Rosa desea invertir en más productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: plátanos, manzanas, uvas, limones, tomates entre otros productos para ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, por lo que espera contar con este apoyo para mejorar sus ventas y ganancias.
texts.en: Rosa is a 49 year old woman who makes a living selling household fruits and vegetables, so that she has many customers seeking her products, and she is happy to have this business.  Rosa lives in her own home with her two daughters, 18 and 9 years old, whom she has managed to raise as a single mother.  Rosa wants to invest in more products, therefore she is requesting a loan with FUSAI to invest in: bananas, apples, grapes, lemons, tomatoes and other products, in order to offer a greater variety of products to her customers.  She hopes to receive this support so that she may improve her sales and profits.

loans.use: to invest in: bananas, apples, grapes, lemons, tomatoes and other products, in order to offer a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia Juana pertenece al banco comunal LA INMACULADA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata, provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Juana continua con su negocio de agricultura, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia se siente agradecida con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono,fertilizantes entre otros.
texts.en:
Juana belongs to the "La Inmaculada" (The Immaculate One) communal bank. The bank is located in Kosñipata District, which is in Paucartambo Province and Cusco Department.

Juana still has her agricultural business. She is a responsible and diligent person. She feels grateful about the loan she has been granted and promises to comply with her established repayment plan. Her agricultural business is how she gets her family ahead.

Juana is requesting the loan to purchase compost, fertilizers and other items.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer and other items.

loans.name: Lucrecia

texts.en:
Lucrecia is from a town of Carles, Iloilo. She is married and has seven children. Three of whom, ages 19, 18 and 15 years old, are still dependent on them. Her husband is a fisherman and Lucrecia helps her husband by selling their catch. In addition to this, she also buys and sells herbal products. Lucrecia and her husband have been engaged in business for 25 years.

She is asking a loan to afford boat maintenance, buy fishing nets to improve their catch, and also to buy herbal products to sell.

In the future, she wishes to upturn their means of living and to be sustainable.

loans.use: afford boat maintenance, buy fishing nets and herbal products.

loans.name: Ma. Delia

texts.en:
Ma. Delia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 6 years. Ma. Delia earns additional income from a general store.

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Ma. Delia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF.

She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 47 years old, married with two children, both of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Rosalie has a food vending business in the Philippines. Rosalie has been in this business for 15 years. Rosalie has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Rosalie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Hosiyat

texts.ru: Хосият доброжелательная и молодая женщина, ей 43 лет. Она замужем и у неё трое детей. Хосият живет вместе со своей семьёй в городе Истаравшан, она занята в малом бизнесе, фактически она покупает ткани  и вышивает из него одежду, которую перепродают на рынке. Всё что она зарабатывает, расходуется на содержание семьи. У неё нет возможности накопить денег для другие более перспективные цели.  Хосият хочет расширить свой бизнес, так как  спрос на её продукции повышается. Но у неё не хватает денежных средств, для этого она обратилась в ООО МДО Арванд за получением кредита с целью увеличения своего оборотного капитала. Она очень благодарна ООО МДО "Арванд" за поддержку и доверие оказанную ей.
texts.en:
Hosiyat is a friendly young woman.  She is 43, married, and she has three children.  She lives with her family in the city of Istaravshan and she has her own small business which consists in sewing clothes from some fabrics that she buys, and then selling her production at the market.  All the money that she makes is spent to support her family and she can't save any of her earnings for other long-term goals.

Hosiyat wants to increase her business because she is receiving an increased demand for the clothes that she makes.  However, she doesn't have enough financial resources and, for this reason, she is turning to Kiva's partner, MDO Arvand, in order to get a loan which will help her to increase her working capital.  She is very thankful to MDO Arvand for their support and their trust.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Jayhun

texts.ru: 28 летный молодой муж и отец Чайхун. Он житель города Душанбе. Чайхун имеет двоих маленьких детишек. Жена домохозяйка и ухаживает за детьми. Чайхун серьезный и активный парень. Он работает кассиром в автозаправочной станции.  4 года Чайхун продвигает свою работу. Еще он свободное время занимается таксистом. Он арендует автомашину «Starex». Чайхун решил купить себе автомашину и заниматься таксистом в свободное время. Потому что он каждую неделю оплатит за аренду. Ему выгодно будет зарабатывать на своем автомашине. С такими планами Чайхун обратился к Вам за кредитом. Он верит в Вас и надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Jayhun, age 28, is a young husband and father, and a resident of the city of Dushanbe.  He has two small children.  His wife is a homemaker and she takes care of the children.  Jayhun is a serious and dynamic young man who has been working as a cashier at a gas station for the past four years.  In his free time he also works as a taxi driver.  For this, he rents a "Starex" car.

Jayhun has decided to buy his own car in order to continue working as a taxi driver in his spare time.  At the moment, he has to pay his car rental every week.  He would actually prefer to buy his own car.  With this goal in mind, he is turning to you for a loan.  He relies on you and on your support.

loans.use: to buy his own car.

loans.name: Aide

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal LA INMACULADA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Kosñipata, provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Aide continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua vendiendo su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose   a este  negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones personales ,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche, golosinas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "La Inmaculada" (The Immaculate One) communal bank. The bank is located in Kosñipata District, which is in Paucartambo Province and Cusco Department.

This member, Aide, still has her grocery. She is a responsible and diligent person. She still sells her merchandise to the customers who come to her. Aide has had her business for quite some time, and it brings her personal satisfaction because it is her means for getting her family ahead.

Aide is requesting the loan to purchase milk, sweets and other items.

Aide feels grateful for the loan she has been granted, and she promises to comply with her established repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase milk, sweets and other items.

loans.name: Ma. Divinia

texts.en:
Ma. Divinia is 51 years old and married with five children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Divinia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, home products, and other groceries to sell.

Ma. Divinia has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as soap, shampoo, dried fish, beverages, toiletries, condiments and other groceries.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Ma. Divinia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, snack foods, home products, and other groceries to sell.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 60 years old and a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Grace has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years.

Grace requested a PHP 19000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Grace would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
Ma. Fe is 59 years old and married with five children, all of whom are in school. Ma. Fe works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Fe runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, spices, etc..

Ma. Fe has been in this business for 27 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, soap, rice, can goods, beauty products, vinegar and other groceries.

In the future, Ma. Fe would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, spices, etc.

loans.name: Era

texts.en:
Era is 46 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living through her pig fattening business in the Philippines. She has been in pig fattening for 3 years and also earns additional income from general store. Era is borrowing PHP 11000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Genèviève

texts.fr: Geneviève est une femme débrouillarde et travailleuse de 44 ans. Elle est mariée et son mari est menuisier. Auparavant, elle l'aidait dans l'exercice de cette activité de menuiserie. Les deux époux sont très solidaires et s'entraident mutuellement pour entretenir et soutenir la famille. La dureté de la vie et l'ambition d'avancer et de s'améliorer leur poussaient à chercher d'autre activité source de revenu. C'est pourquoi, elle démarrait une activité de vente de friperie il y a maintenant deux ans. Alors, pour pouvoir développer et étendre cette nouvelle activité (friperie), elle demande un prêt à travers CEFOR. L'objectif est d'augmenter le revenu afin de pouvoir améliorer le niveau de la famille. Elle a deux enfants dont l'ainé âgé de 21 ans est déjà marié et le second 18 ans est en classe terminale.
texts.en:
Geneviève is a hard-working problem-solver who is 44 years old. She is married, and her husband is a furniture maker. In the past, she used to help him operate this wood-working business. The couple have a lot of solidarity and mutually assist one another in maintaining and supporting the family.

A harsh life and the ambition to get ahead and to improve themselves have driven them to find other revenue-generating work. This is why Geneviève began a business selling secondhand clothing two years ago. So, to be able to develop and expand this new business (used clothing), she is asking for a loan through CEFOR. The goal is to increase revenues to improve the family’s living conditions.

She has two children, of whom the elder is 21 years old and already married, and the second child is a senior in high school.

loans.use: to purchase bales of secondhand clothing

loans.name: Oscar Rodolfo

texts.es: Oscar de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de resdencia desde hace 9 años, tambien trabaja como ordenanza en una escuela, con lo que obtiene de sus trabajos es como puede alir adelante con su familia, Oscar esta solicitando un credito un credito para la compra de un frizzer para vender prodcutos helados y mas mercaderia por mayor para surtir su negocio y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Oscar is 34-years old. He lives in his own home with this three children. Oscar has a small store that he has run out of his home for the last nine years. In addition, Oscar works as an administrative assistant in a school. With what he earns from his jobs, he is able to get his family ahead.

Oscar is requesting a loan to purchase a freezer so he can sell frozen products. He will also purchase more wholesale merchandise to stock up his store and improve his income.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and more wholesale merchandise.

loans.name: Micaela Bastidas Group

texts.es:
Maria es una socia de la alcancía comunal “Micaela Bastidas”, el préstamo obtenido lo invirtió en la compra de mercadería de abarrotes al por mayor para así implementar su negocio, con eso ha podido aumentar su capital en su negocio, sus metas ahora es ampliar su tiendita a llegar a ser un minimarket, además darle una mejor educación a sus hijos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Maria está muy agradecida por todo el apoyo económico que se le ha dado, al igual que a los demás integrantes de la alcancía comunal "Micaela Bastidas". Maria es la que esta al medio del grupo con chompa de color azul.
Mr. Jesus, husband of Mrs. Beatriz does not belong to the group but accompanies his wife in the photograph. He is the third from the right, is with blue sweater and has the left arm on the shoulder of his wife.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank, "Micaela Bastidas.” The previously obtained loan was invested in buying merchandise for groceries in bulk to implement her business. With this, she has been able to augment capital for her business.

Her goals now are to expand her small store so that it becomes a minimarket and to give her children better education, so that her family can have a  better quality of life. Maria is very grateful for all the economic help that she has received. The other members of the communal bank "Micaela Bastidas" are equally grateful. Maria is the woman in the middle of the group with a blue color shirt. 

Sr. Jesús, husband of Miss Beatriz, does not

loans.use: to buy merchandise for groceries in bulk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in creams, makeup and lotions and products she needs to make the delicious soup that she prepares.

loans.name: Señor De Pucca Mocco Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE PUCCA MOCCO, el banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia Alejandrina  continua con su negocio al negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones personales entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, menestras, carnes entre otros.
Los demás socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
El socio que sale en la foto adjunta pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Señor de Pucca Mocco community bank. The bank is located in the Cusco department.

The member Alejandrina continues with her restaurant business. She's been in this business a long time and it's going well thanks to the effort she puts in everyday. She's a responsible and earnest person.

She has been in business a long time, which brings her personal satisfaction, among other things. She feels grateful for the loan and promises to follow payments of her quota. Continuing this way, she will bring her family forward.

The member seeks the loan to buy rice, beans and meats, among other things. The other members feel grateful for the loan and promise to comply with established payments.

The member not present in the photo asked for permission to come late to the meeting due to work.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and meat, among other things.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen sells fish in the market, while her husband does the fishing. She's been in this business for over 5 years and has been successfully repaying her previous loan.

Belen wants to improve and expand her business. Recently, she took a new loan to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets, to catch more fish to sell.

In the future, Belen hopes to improve her family's general living situation.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets, to catch more fish to sell.

loans.name: Heidy Cristabel

texts.es: Heidy de 28 años de edad, vive junto a su hermana de 17 años y su hijo de 8 años de edad, además de su compañero de vida. Heidy tiene un pequeño negocio en el cual vende artículos básicos del hogar y también ropa, negocio con el cual mantiene la economía del hogar, así también su esposo la ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Heidy necesita incrementar la cantidad de productos que posee en su tienda y con ello las ventas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: aceite, especias, granos básicos, y muchos artículos necesarios para el hogar, además de sandalias, camisas, blusas, faldas, pantalones, entre otras prendas de vestir. Para maximizar sus ingresos y de esta forma ofrecerle una mejor vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Heidy is 28 years old and lives with her 17-year-old sister, her eight-year-old son and her life partner.

She has a small business in which she sells basic household goods and clothing. This business supports her household, and her husband also helps her with household expenses.

Heidy needs to increase the quantity of products in her store and thus the sales. For this, she seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in oil, spices, basic goods and many items necessary for the home, as well as sandals, shirts, blouses, skirts, pants and other clothing.

This is to maximize her income and thus offer her son a better life.

loans.use: to invest in oil, spices, basic goods, sandals, shirts, blouses, skirts, pants and other clothing.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 41 años de edad, habita en vivienda propia, vive junto a su compañero de vida. María es una persona emprendedora que busca la manera de salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida, para ello se dedica a la venta de ropa y su compañero de vida se dedica a trabajar como motorista para ayudar en la economía del hogar. Ella hace todo lo posible por cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. Es por ello que María solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: camisas, blusas, pantalones, ropa interior, faldas, y todo tipo de ropa para comercializar y así obtener ganancias, ya que ese es su medio para sobrevivir el día con día.
texts.en:
María is 41 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner. She is an entrepreneurial person who looks for ways to get ahead and improve her quality of life.

Because of this, she earns a living selling clothing and her partner works as a driver to help with the household economy. She does everything possible to cover her family's basic needs.

Thus, María seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in shirts, blouses, pants, underwear, skirts and all types of clothing to sell. In this way, she'll earn income which is how she survives day to day.

loans.use: to invest in shirts, blouses, pants, underwear, skirts and all types of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, iron rods, cement, sand and gravel to build a sink and washing area in her home.

loans.name: Hector Arvidas

texts.es: Hector es un joven estudiante de la carrera de Contabilidad y finanzas desde hace dos años y medio en una universidad local,su máximo sueño es terminar su carrera y poner su propio estudio contable el préstamo que solicitó lo invertirá para el pago adelantado en las mensualidades de la universidad ya que por ello le hacen un  descuento, Hector se siente muy feliz de poder contar con entidades como EDAPROSPO que ayudan a jóvenes emprendedores a salir adelante y ser profesionales exitosos. Agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por el apoyo brindado y dice que no parará hasta lograr sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Héctor has been a student of accounting and finance at a local university for two-and-a-half years. His biggest dream is to finish his program and set up his own accounting office.

He's going to invest the loan he requested in making his monthly payments to the university in advance because he'll earn a discount. Héctor is very happy he can count on organizations such as ours that help enterprising young people get ahead and become successful professionals.

He's grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support and he says, "Thank you very much for everything. I won't stop until my dreams become a reality.

loans.use: to make his payments to the university

loans.name: Pucaray De Huancalle Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PUCARAY DE HUANCALLE”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Pisac, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Victoria, la socia continua con su  negocio de  crianza de animales menores, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua criando a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose a la venta de verduras, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para comprar animales como cuyes y alimentos como alfalfa entre otros.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de papa, negocio de agricultura, negocio de venta de comida, venta de hortalizas.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
These are the members of "PUCARAY DE HUANCALLE", a Communal Bank located in the Pisac district, in the Cusco province and department.

Victoria is one of the members. She continues carrying out her activity, breeding small animals. She is a responsible and committed person. She continues breeding her small animals to then sell them to her customers. At times, she also continues engaging in selling vegetables, as she provides for her family thanks to these two jobs.

The partner requesting a loan to buy animals like guinea pigs and foods like alfalfa and others.

The other members engage in selling potatoes, in agricultural activities, in selling meals and in selling vegetables.

Victoria is thankful for the loan she has received and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy animals such as guinea pigs and food like alfalfa among others.

loans.name: Ana Irene

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer dedicada a vender tortilla para tener más entradas de dinero y apoyar a su pareja con los gastos de su hogar, vive únicamente con su compañero de vida, han procreado dos hijos, uno ya está casado y la segunda estudia en el extranjero; su negocio lo tiene desde hace 27 años, atiende a sus clientes de 6:00 am. a 1:30 pm., la hace con ayuda de dos empleadas, las cuales van al molino, hacen tortillas y también atienden a los clientes.
El crédito le dará recursos económicos para para comprar una plancha nueva y más grande, para aumentar la producción de tortillas, le ahorrara tiempo, tendrá más producto para vender y atender a nuevos clientes.
Sus objetivos son mantener la rentabilidad de su negocio y continuar aportando al progreso de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is a woman who makes a living selling tortillas to earn additional income and help her partner with the expenses of the household. She only lives with her life partner. They have two children, one is already married and the second is studying abroad. She has had her business for 27 years, and she serves her customers from 6:00 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. She has two employees who help her by going to the mill, making tortillas and also by serving customers.

This loan will give her the economic resources to buy a new bigger grill, to increase her production of tortillas. It will save her time, and she will have more products to sell and new customers to serve.

Her goals are to maintain the profitability of her business and continue contributing to the progress of her family.

loans.use: to buy a new and bigger grill to increase her tortilla production.

loans.name: Inhco Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por 3 mujeres emprendedoras de la ciudad de Bilwi, Municipio Puerto Cabezas, se unieron hace aproximadamente 3 años, para acceder a financiamiento mediante crédito para incrementar el inventario de sus pequeños negocios, mejorar sus ingresos y poder cubrir las necesidades básicas de sus hogares, asegurar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar sus viviendas.

RUTH NOEMY: Es integrante del grupo solidario, es una señora amable de 24 años de edad, está casada, tiene 1 hijo de 3 años de edad. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal como pescador artesanal. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos y apoyar con los gastos del hogar, desde hace 5 años comenzó con la venta ambulante de productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo, gracias a las ganancias y créditos otorgados por PANA PANA, le han permitido diversificar sus productos, al vender fritos y enchiladas en su vivienda de tambo y madera.  Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar insumos e ingredientes: pollo, aceite, repollo, tomate, cebolla, vinagre, pepino, entre otros productos. Sueña con establecer una pulpería.
texts.en:
This communal bank is made up of three enterprising women from the city of Bilwi, in Puerto Cabezas municipality. They got together about three years ago to access financing through loans. The aim is to increase the inventory of their small businesses, improve their income, be able to cover the basic necessities of their households, assure the education of their children and improve their homes.

Ruth Noemy is a member of the communal bank. She is a friendly 24 year old who is married and has one three year old child. Her husband works informally as a small scale fisherman. With the aim of having her own source of income and helping with the household expenses she started the itinerant sales of beauty products and cosmetics by catalog five years ago. Thanks to her profits and the loans awarded by PANA PANA have allowed her to diversify her products, selling fried and enchiladas at her wooden stilt house. She is requesting financing to buy supplies and ingredients to make fried chicken and enchiladas. She dreams of having a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients like chicken, oil, cabbage, tomato, onion, vinegar, cucumber, and other products.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana de 46 años de edad, es madre soltera quien a diario se esfuerza por darle lo mejor a su hijo quien depende de ella. Ana es una persona muy trabajadora y se gana la vida con la venta de platos típicos como lo es la sopa de patas, y ahora ha agregado otro platillo a su venta como lo es el tamal de carne. Además de eso, Ana vende productos de belleza por catálogos, actividad que le ayuda a maximizar sus ingresos económicos. Ella tiene una visión, y es lograr tener una mejor vida al lado de su hijo y para ello necesita ampliar su negocio. Es por esto que Ana solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertirlo en: productos de belleza, yuca, papas, repollo, especias, carne, maíz, plátano y otros ingredientes claves para la elaboración de sus platos típicos. También Ana se encuentra muy agradecida con el crédito que se le fue otorgado anteriormente, ya que con ello pudo mejorar su negocio y de esta forma seguir teniendo los ingresos necesarios para cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Ana, 46, is a single mother who works daily to provide the best for her son who depends on her. Ana is a very hard worker and makes her living by selling local dishes such as sopa de patas [a Salvadoran beef soup]. She has also added another dish, which are beef tamales. Ana also sells beauty products through catalogs, an activity that helps her maximize her income.

She has a goal and it is to achieve a better life for her son. To achieve this goal, she needs to expand her business. That is why Ana is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in beauty products, yucca, potatoes, cabbage, spices, meat, corn, plantains, and other ingredients to make traditional dishes. Ana is also very grateful for the loan that she was given before as she could improve her business and have the income necessary to meet her needs.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products and ingredients to cook traditional dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to use for a bathroom in her home in order to maintain the sanitation of her household.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 41 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo de 10 años, y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora y muy independiente. Su negocio lo realiza ambulando por la zona Sur de la ciudad, área de comercio constante en todas las áreas.
Maria es morena de baja estatura y físico robusto. Su vida la comparte con su hijo que estudia en la escuela viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos, como; lápiz labial, pintura de uñas, corrector de ojos, delineadores y otros, “camino todo el día en busca de mi antiguos y nuevos clientes…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes y rutas diarias, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de diferentes perfumes y cosméticos por mayor y con los beneficios pagar la escuela de su hijo. Su sueño es tener su tienda propia en el centro de la ciudad. Ella desea comprar mercadería para su negocio por mayor para abaratas costos y con los beneficios pagar los gastos escolares de su hijo. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de perfumes y cosméticos para ofertar a mejor precio.
texts.en:
Maria is a 41-year-old, single woman with one son who is 10 years old. Her business is selling cosmetics.

She is a good mother, entrepreneurial, and very independent. She sells her cosmetics by traveling through the southern zone of the city, an area of constant commerce everywhere.

Maria is dark-haired, of short stature and robust physique. She shares her life with her son who goes to school. They live in a rented room made of brick and containing all basic necessities. Her business is the sale of cosmetics, such as; lip pencil, nail polish, concealer, eyeliners and other products. "I walk all day in search of my old and new customers..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she can count on her customers and daily routes. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to buy different perfumes and cosmetics wholesale and with the savings pay for school for her son. Her dream is to have her own store in the center of the city. She would like to buy merchandise for her business wholesale in order to pay lower prices and with the savings pay for school expenses for her son. This is the first loan cycle she is applying for with the institution in the one year she has worked in this business.

It is for these reasons that Maria is applying for a loan to buy perfumes and cosmetics to offer a better price.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetics and with her savings pay for school for her son.

loans.name: Lomas Del Sur Group

texts.es:
Mayer continúa con su negocio de venta de embutidos. El préstamo que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de una heladera con mostrador, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque pudo trabajar sin inconvenientes (de pie al centro, vite chompa gris). La banca continúa trabajando con normalidad, su negocio mejoró, actualmente cuenta con mayor variedad de productos almacenados en frio, “la ventas mejoraron porque aumente la variedad de productos…” comenta. la ventaja de su negocio es que la competencia es escasa en el lugar, la desventaja es la falta de capital para abastecer su negocio con embutidos de cerdo, res y otros. Su sueño es consolidar su negocio y estabilizarlo, ella desea comprar variedades de embutidos por mayor para abastecer su negocio. Esta es la 4 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Mayer solicita un préstamo para comprar variedades de embutidos por mayor para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Mayer is continuing with her business selling sausage. The loan she got previously was invested in buying a refrigerated display case and her loan payments were punctual because she was able to work without inconvenience.

She's on foot in the center of the photos in a grey sweater.

The bank continues working normally and her business improved. Now she has a better variety of cold products. "Sales improved because I increased the variety of products," she says.

The advantage of her business is that competition in the area is scarce. The challenge is the lack of capital to stock her business with pork, beef and other sausages.

Her dream is to consolidate her business and stabilize it. She wants to buy varieties of sausage in bulk to stock her business.

She's in the fourth cycle of loans in the institution and has been doing this work for three years. Thus, Mayer seeks a loan to buy sausage varieties wholesale to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy varieties of sausage in bulk to supply their business.

loans.name: Margarita Magadalena

texts.en:
Margarita is a woman on her late 50s. She is married and has no children to provide for. Her husband makes a living for both of them by working as a workman. She contributes to the household income by making and selling finely handcrafted clothing.

She works with any kind of cloth, but she enjoys making things for babies and children, like quilts, sweaters, first communion and baptism outfits, and dresses for older girls, for their 15th birthday party and so on.

She wants to expand her business by increasing her raw material stock. She is looking to buy fabric and cloth and a special sewing machine to do more complicated designs with nicer details. She likes to make her clothes with a Spanish influence style, and with a 5,264 MXN loan, she will be able to expand her project and manage to get a higher income for her household.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and cloth and a special sewing machine for making her finely handcrafted clothing

loans.name: Cindy Tatiana

texts.en:
Cindy is 25 years old and lives in the municipality of Bello. At her young age, she has done a lot, but now she wants to accomplish a dream that she has had for a long time, and it’s to start her own business. She has a little girl of 5 years and she is her reason to want to improve her life.

She wants to start a business selling products, especially drinks, which she found out about, thanks to a friend who taught her about it. She doesn’t have the money to purchase the initial inventory, so she’s asking for a loan so she can start her business, and to buy some energizer drinks and juices to start selling.

Cindy has many dreams, but right now she’s focused on working hard and making her business successful and on being able to pay for her daughter's education. 

Help Cindy now with the start of her business with a loan.

loans.use: to buy some energizer drinks and juices for her business

loans.name: Jhon Fredy

texts.en:
Jhon is 37 years old and lives in the municipality of Caicedo. This man is in one of the most traditional businesses in Colombia, and one of the most recognized in the world, coffee growing and production. He inherited the business from his family. His father, an expert on this topic, was his teacher.

Right now Jhon wants to invest in his business. He wants to make his coffee growing bigger so he has more to offer and can answer the demand he has. He’s asking for a loan so he can buy 17 packs of fertilizer to grow better quality coffee.

Jhon has many dreams but he has one now that happens to be also a need. His house has some issues that need repairing and he wants to fix it as fast as he can. Help Jhon with this dream and his business so he can improve his life. A loan will let him accomplish all of that.

loans.use: buy 17 packs of fertilizer for growing better quality coffee.

loans.name: Dúo Nueva Vición Group

texts.es: Dúo Nueva Vición, representado por la señora Raquel Armanda quien tiene tres hijos a su cargo, dos de ellos trabajan con ella, es madre soltera, doña Raquel se dedica a la venta de verduras como, tomate, cebollas, elotes, chiles pimientos, zanahorias, también granos basicos Como frijol, también vende medicina natural en su mismo puesto en el mercado Municipal, de Santiago Sac, también en su casa cría pollos y no tiene perdidas pues la verdura que ya no está fresca se las da a sus pollos, este es su tercer crédito, esta muy agradecida con kiva ya que por medio de la ayuda de los créditos ella a salidos adelante, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de verduras para vender.
texts.en:
Dúo Nueva Vición [New Vision Duo] is represented by Raquel Armanda who has three dependent children. Two of them work alongside her. She is a single mother. Raquel sells vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, corn, bell pepper, carrots, and also basic staple products like beans. She also sells natural medicine in her stall at the municipal market in Santiago Sac. She also raises chickens at home and has not lost much money because when a vegetable is no longer fresh enough to sell, she gives it to her chickens.

This is her third loan with Kiva and she is very grateful because the help of the loans has helped her to succeed. She is requesting this loan to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to sell

loans.name: Jairo

texts.es: Jairo es un agricultor de 39 años que siembra y cosecha hortalizas y además granos básicos como maíz y frijol en la comunidad de Olanchito, Honduras. Para el la vida en el campo ofrece muchos beneficios pero también hay algunos obstáculos que afrontar como la falta de energía eléctrica. Jairo y su familia conocen la ventaja de lo  que es tener iluminación y otros servicios a través de lo que un sistema solar ofrece, ya que en su vivienda cuentan con uno. Pero  algunos componentes del sistema solar se han dañado lo que ha provocado que haya una inestabilidad, y nuevamente han tenido que volver a iluminarse con velas y lámparas a base de kerosén y también han vuelto a  recorrer grandes distancias, pedir favores y en ocasiones pagar por el servicio de cargar un celular. Por estas razones Jairo solicita de Soluz Honduras este préstamo para adquirir los componentes necesarios para que su sistema pueda volver a funcionar de manera óptima iluminando la vivienda, recibiendo el servicio para carga de celulares y ayudando a su hija con los deberes escolares.
texts.en:
Jairo is a 39-year-old farmer who grows and harvests vegetables and basic grains such as corn and beans in the community of Olanchito, Honduras. For him, life in the countryside offers many benefits but there are also some obstacles he must face such as the lack of electricity.

Jairo and his family know the advantages of having light and other services that a solar power system can offer because they have one in their house. But some of its components have gotten damaged causing it to be unreliable, and they have had to revert to using candles and kerosene lamps. They have even had to travel long distances, ask favors and occasionally pay to charge a cell phone.

These are the reasons why Jairo is applying to Soluz Honduras for this loan so that he can buy the components he needs to get his system running optimally again, lighting his house, receiving the cell phone charging service, and helping his daughter do her schoolwork.

loans.use: to buy a package (1 battery, 1 controller, 2 LED lights) to reactivate the solar power system for his home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El tiene 56 años de edad es casado. Trabaja como mecánico automotriz, necesita un implante de lente intraocular por las cataratas que padece en el ojo derecho, por diferentes circunstancias no ha podido tratarse, pero conforme avanza el tiempo su visión empeora. En su trabajo es donde mas impacta por que por las noches tiene que manejar, corriendo el riesgo de sufrir algún accidente.
texts.en:
This gentleman is 56 years old and married. He is an automobile mechanic and needs an intraocular lens implant because of the cataract that is present in his right eye. Due to various circumstances, he was not able to obtain treatment and now his vision has worsened as time has passed.

The effect is greatly felt in his work since he has to drive at night. This increases his risk of getting into an accident.

loans.use: to pay for eye surgery.

loans.name: Claudia Elizabeth

texts.es: Claudia de 30 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y a sus 2 hijos de 8 años y  5 años de edad. Claudia posee una pequeña tienda con cosas básicas pero necesarias para el hogar y debido a que ella presta sus servicios en una pupusería que está cerca de su casa, la madre de Claudia es quien administra la tienda, pero así también su compañero de vida labora como panadero y de esta manera ayudar en la economía del hogar y con lo cual sacan adelante a su familia. Es por ello que Claudia busca la manera de mejorar su negocio y para lo que ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: granos básicos, detergente, especias, bebidas, aceite, entre muchas cosas más que necesita para su tienda. Para poder obtener más ganancias y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia is 30 years old and lives in a house on her property, together with her life partner and their two children who are eight and five years old.

Claudia has a small store with basic but necessary household goods. Because she works at a pupusa [a Salvadorean tortilla] store near home, Claudia's mother looks after the store. Her husband also works as a baker and thus helps the household economy and bring his family ahead.

Claudia is looking for a way of improving her business and has thus asked for a loan from FUSAI to invest in basic goods, detergent, spices, drinks and oil, among many other things she needs for her store. She will be able to earn better income and thus improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in basic goods, detergent, spices, drinks and oil, among other things, for her store.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, tiene 32 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijas, reside con su familia en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. El se ha dedicado siempre a la agricultura, con el cultivo de maíz, café y frijol. Esta actividad que realiza es su fuente de ingresos familiar. Ha solicitado otro prestamo a ODEF el cual es el cuarto ciclo y es por 22,000 Lempiras para comprar abonos y pago de mano de obra para darle la asistencia que necesita su finca de café. Con este prestamo va mejorar la producción y los ingresos. Tiene como meta a futuro comprar un terreno listo para cría de ganado y poder mejorar los ingresos.
texts.en:
Alexander, 32, lives with his common-law spouse with whom he has two daughters. He resides with his family in the hamlet of Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. He has always made a living from agriculture, cultivating corn, coffee, and beans. This work is the source of the family's income.

He has requested another loan from ODEF which is the fourth cycle and it is for 22,000 lempiras in order to buy manure and to pay for the labor in order to give his coffee farm the help it needs. With this loan, he will improve production and income.

He has as a future goal to buy a plot of land ready for raising cattle and to be able to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy manure and pay for the labor to give his coffee farm the help it needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing like blouses and skirts and corn, beans, and cheese to make stuffed tortillas

loans.name: Nimia Celinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nimia Celinda; la socia sigue trabajando en uno de los colegios de la zona, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia es una persona responsable, la socia es docente de profesión, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales didácticos entre otros.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "SAN VALENTIN". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The partner is Nimia Celinda. She continues to work in one of the colleges of the zone. The partner feels grateful for the loan and promises to fulfill all the payments of her loan. She is a responsible person. She is an instructor by profession. The partner wishes to continue working since in this way she can continue supporting her family.

The partner is requesting the loan in order to buy instructional materials amongst other things.

loans.use: to buy teaching materials amongst other things.

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr: Célibataire et mère de deux enfants, Akouavi est une femme âgée de 48 ans résidant à Tokoin. Akouavi fabrique et revend des pains en gros et en détail à ses clients. Akouavi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois du nécessaire pour la fabrication au marché et le revend à son domicile. Akouavi sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de farine de blé et du sucre afin d’aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées.
texts.en: Unmarried and the mother of two, Akouavi is 48 years old and resides in Tokoin. She makes and sells breads wholesale and retail to her customers. She gets her necessary supplies twice a month at the market for her production. And she resells at her home. Akouavi is requesting this loan to order sacks of wheat flour and sugar in order to help her children with their education and to cover the proven day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 5 sacks of wheat flour and a bag of sugar

loans.name: Wingie

texts.en:
Wingie is a married woman with three children. She is 31 years old and has two children who are still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Wingie has a buy-and-sell Personal Collection business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 6 years. Wingie requested a PHP 9.000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items like beauty soap, body lotion, perfume, toothpaste and other personal care products.

Wingie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like beauty soap, body lotion, perfume, toothpaste and other personal care products.
